name: Soulmate Factory
description:
A good soulmate is hard to find!

You just opened the world’s first Soulmate Factory and customers are already beating a path to your door! To control the situation, you developed a unique grappler device to sort folks into soulmate pairs. Keep up the matching before they stop believing in you!

Fabian Fischer created the game in a personal game jam to explore a design centered around the slow-to-fast, back-and-forth capabilities of the Playdate’s unique crank input device. The game is also meant to be a holiday gift to the handheld’s community full of players and developers passionate about indie games, non-mainstream platforms and game design experimentalism.

How to play?

This game is made for the Playdate handheld console! Please follow the sideloading instructions to get it on your device!
